id: # id is a string to identify the project
# enable_setting is a | separated list of settings that must be true for this project to be enabled. All projects require boggledTerraformingContentEnabled
enable_setting: so you don't need to specify it

id: # project_type is the type of the project. Currently supported ones are 'terraforming' and 'industry'
# tooltip is how this project is displayed on the buttons on the UI. Sorry it's a terrible name
# requirements is a | separated list of requirement IDs as specified in 'terraforming_requirements.csv'. These are checked in an AND manner
enable_setting: ie all of the requirements have to be true for this check to return true

id: # requirements_hidden is the same as requirements
enable_setting: but they must be met for the project to be visible. Both this and requirements must be met for the project to be started

id: # planet_type_change is what the planet type should change to upon project completion
# conditions_added is a | separated list of conditions that will be added to the planet upon project completion
# conditions_removed is a | separated list of conditions that will be removed from the planet upon project completion
# optional_conditions is a | separated list of 'option ; condition' pairs. If the option is true
enable_setting: the condition will be included in conditions_added
project_type: otherwise it will be included in conditions_removed

id: # resources_to_progress is a | separated list of 'resource ; step' pairs. Upon project completion
enable_setting: the resource will be improved by step amounts along the progression specified in 'resource_progression.csv'

id: # base_project_duration is the base number of days the project takes to complete
# dynamic_project_duration_modifiers is a | separated list of duration modifier IDs that are specified in 'duration_modifiers.csv'

requirements: world_type_allows_terraforming | colony_not_arid_world | colony_atmospheric_density_normal | colony_atmosphere_not_toxic_or_irradiated | colony_temperate_or_hot | colony_has_stellar_reflectors | colony_has_moderate_water_present
